contest-event.event-date: April 12, 1980 D Carnegie Invitation Contest (Championship Section) Carnegie Invitation Contest (Championship Section) 100 Entertainments Contest Fife Brass Band Festival carnegie-invitation-contest-championship-section Now known as the Fire Brass Band Festival.
